name: Firefox ZDark Theme 0.98h ─ Horizontal Tabs
description:
Dark Minimal styled Firefox theme. 

A vertical tab version can be found here, but requires additional third-party add-ons.

https://userstyles.org/styles/140837/firefox-zdark-theme-0-97v-vertical-tabs

This theme is optimized for use with Firefox 52.0b9, after that, Mozilla did the WebExtensions update, which breaks just about every add-on on the market, including Stylish.
additional_info:
A WebExtensions version is in development, for more information follow me and message me on Facebook. ─www.facebook.com/ZmVyc3SoF

Starting from Firefox 53, no new legacy add-ons will be accepted on addons.mozilla.org (AMO) for desktop Firefox and Firefox for Android, this is a problem for zDark because it breaks Stylish and other extensions. I suggest you use Firefox 52

Starting from Firefox 57, only extensions developed using WebExtensions APIs will be supported on Desktop Firefox and Firefox for Android
